Title: Relates to increasing the base benefit amount for computation of pension cost-of-living adjustments
Summary: Increases the base benefit amount for computation of pension cost-of-living adjustments.
LawCode: Amd §§78-a & 378-a, R & SS L; amd §532-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the education law, in relation to increasing the base benefit amount for computation of pension cost-of-living adjustments
